mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, total_amount, status, shipping_address) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{shippingAddress})
INSERT INTO order_items (order_id, product_id, quantity, price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, u.full_name as user_name FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT o.*, u.full_name as user_name FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
SELECT o.*, u.full_name as user_name FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT oi.*, p.name as product_name, p.image_url as product_image FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
